about_the_game: Experience the exhilaration of Kiteboarding as you ride the waves, performing thrilling jumps and tricks propelled by the wind. Challenge yourself to reach the goals while navigating around floating obstacles, or choose to ride in the opposite direction to practice jumps and soak in the breathtaking views. Personalize your experience by selecting your Rider, Outfit, Kite, Bar, Harness, and Board. With 10 diverse locations to choose from, or the option to download new items and locations from the Store, the possibilities are endless. Customize your ride further by adjusting the wind direction, time of day, or wave size - the game offers a plethora of options to tailor your experience. While Kiteboarding is easy to pick up, mastering takes skill and dedication. At any point, you can pause the game, adjust the camera, and capture stunning screenshots to showcase your expertise.
